mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(bnum, btitle, bcontent, binquiry, bdate, bupload1, bupload2, bupload3, brecommend, idx, cg_num) values(#{bnum}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, 0, sysdate, #{bupload1:VARCHAR}, #{bupload2:VARCHAR}, #{bupload3:VARCHAR}, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select * from board order by bnum desc
mapper.update: update board set binquiry = binquiry+1 where bnum=#{bnum}
